Name: Planetoid Pioneers Online
About the game: Physics-driven gameplay, animation, construction, destruction, damage, and deaths 12 different game modes at launch; more to come - both from developers and the community 2-4 player PvP, PvE, co-op, racing, building - something for everyone; see videos above Seamless online multiplayer resistant to cheating and lag on our own free servers Host or join easily and quickly with your fav Steam friends - or randos on the internet Game simulation stays perfectly synced at all times - we check every frame! Editors available in Planetoid Pioneers Contributor Edition to add or change game modes!
